title: 试指令
author: 一拿林你和
txt_content:
/give @p 1314520 1 0 {killCount:1314520,ProudSoul:1314520,RepairCounter:520,baseAttackModifier:1314520,RepairCost:1314,AttackAmplifier:1314520f,CustomMaxDamage:1314520,SummonedSwordColor:15204607,StandbyRenderType:1,isNoScabbard:1b,isCBCreator:1b,CurrentItemName:"flammpfeil.slashblade.named.aoi",ModelName:"named/yamazakura/cb_slashblade_model",TextureName:"named/yamazakura/yamazakura_aoi",SpecialAttackType:1705,SB.SEffect:{BurstDrive:1314520},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:1314520,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:1.314520,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:520,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:1.314520,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.movementSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:520,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:offhand,AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:1.314520,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:offhand,AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:5.20,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:offhand,AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:1.1314,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:offhand,AttributeName:"generic.movementSpeed",Name:"CBC"}],display:{Name:"永远爱你的小刀刀",Lore:["永远爱你的小刀刀 ：主人，不管你走到哪里，人家也要跟上你 。"]},Unbreakable:1,HideFlags:5,ench:[{id:20,lvl:2},{id:21,lvl:3},{id:70,lvl:3},{id:17,lvl:5},{id:34,lvl:3},{id:16,lvl:5},{id:18,lvl:5}]}





就上面这个指令，我用mod百科里的命令方块指令做的拔刀剑，前置mod需要拔刀剑，最好再加上尼格洛兹，把这串指令放到命令方块里，试一下会不会出来一把拔刀剑，不行的话换成1.10.2或1.12.2，也不行的话就没办法了，因为我也不会弄，瞎弄的，不好意思浪费大家时间了，最佳答案只收录附图的答案，一百金粒，相当于一个金锭，想要不?

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content:
/give @p 1314520 1 0   是不可以的，提示没有名为1314520的物品，需要将它更改为/give @p flammpfeil.slashblade:slashblade 1 0 


左边掉落形态，中间是尼格洛兹模组（刀模问题我也不知道为什么），以及刀的状态
